member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SparklineView.ActualPixelScalingRatio
member.summary: Gets the actual scaling value used by the component to affect the pixel density of the control.
member.remarks: A higher scaling ratio will produce crisper visuals at the expense of memory. Lower values will cause the control to appear blurry.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SparklineView.NotifyClearItems(System.Object)
member.summary: Used to manually notify the XamSparkline that the data source has reset or cleared its items. Invoking this method is only necessary if that datasource is not observable.
member.param: The data source which was cleared or reset.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SparklineView.NotifyInsertItem(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Used to manually notify the XamSparkline that the data source has had an item inserted. Only necessary if that datasource is not observable.
member.param: The index of the new item

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.SparklineView.NotifyRemoveItem(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Used to manually notify the XamSparkline that the data source has had an item removed. Only necessary if that datasource is not observable.
member.param: The index of the old item.

member.summary: Used to manually notify the XamSparkline that the data source has had an item set. Only necessary if that datasource is not observable.
